creditline: Gift of Charlotte and Markle Karlen
description: sculpture depicting Garden of Eden; tree at center with devil at top and snake sliding down trunk; Adam and Eve figures, each wearing leaf covering genitalia, stand at base of tree; scenes depicting heaven and hell around tree base; angel over Adam's shoulder; various animals, plants and flowers overall; brightly painted
markings: on sticker under base: [ITEM #: 7151/ PRICE: $105.00/ ADAM AND EVE/ (barcode)/ 00715515]
signed: carved in clay below tree: [JOSE FINA AguilAR]; carved in clay between Eve and heaven: JOSE FiNA AguilAR]
title: Expulsion from the Garden of Eden
